title: The New Space Opera
description:
Edited by Gardner Dozois and Jonathan Strahan
Read by John Polk
Format: MP3
Bitrate: 32 Kbps
Unabridged

The rich space opera tradition, extending from the off-world voyages of Verne and Wells to this galaxy-embracing anthology, is arguably sf's most prolific subgenre. Veteran anthologist Dozois and co-editor Strahan present some of the newest boundary-stretching variations on the category's many themes.

Locus Award for Best Anthology (2008)
